name: Wine Tasting and/or horseback riding!!
description:
I focus on introducing my guests to wine en route 
to wine country. My goal is to simplify the Southern California wine 
tasting experience, offering a fun, easy alternative to driving yourself
 or hiring a limousine. As you travel the rolling countryside in 
Temecula Valley or Santa Barbara, your guide (and wine expert) educates 
you on tasting techniques and the area’s crops and vintages. You’ll stop
 at some of my favorite local vineyards for the opportunity to sip a variety 
of vintages; after the sampling rooms, you’ll have a chance to discover 
the area on your own. Whether you want to buy a few bottles to take 
home, keep it to a quaint village stroll or try your luck at the casino 
is up to you. Then it’s back for the journey home.  
      Its about a 10 round trip.
